dict.acceptation: 简单地，朴素地；（引出概括或解释）不过，仅仅；简直；<非正>实在；

sent.orig: I choose Makelele simply because he is quite simply the best midfield player in the world.
sent.trans: 选择马克莱莱的原因很简单，毫无疑问，他是世界上最好的防守中场。

sent.orig: Why do we try to define people as simply good or simply evil?
sent.trans: 为什么我们要把人们简单地分为纯粹的好人或纯粹的魔鬼呢？

sent.orig: I am simply bashing animations are simply too long or too extravagant for their purpose.
sent.trans: 我只是批评那些太长或太过分的动画。
事实上，根本就没有这回事。

sent.orig: Sometimes there's simply a very logical explanation to why something is like it is.
sent.trans: 有时要注脚事为什么这个样子总是有很简略单纯的逻辑。
